register.name: ATS12NSOPR
register.gui_name: Address Translate Stages 1 and 2 Non-secure Only PL1 Read
register.description: Performs stage 1 and 2 address translations as defined for PL1 and the Non-secure state, with permissions as if reading from the given virtual address.

register.name: ATS12NSOPW
register.gui_name: Address Translate Stages 1 and 2 Non-secure Only PL1 Write
register.description: Performs stage 1 and 2 address translations as defined for PL1 and the Non-secure state, with permissions as if writing to the given virtual address.

register.name: ATS12NSOUR
register.gui_name: Address Translate Stages 1 and 2 Non-secure Only Unprivileged Read
register.description: Performs stage 1 and 2 address translations as defined for PL0 and the Non-secure state, with permissions as if reading from the given virtual address.

register.name: ATS12NSOUW
register.gui_name: Address Translate Stages 1 and 2 Non-secure Only Unprivileged Write
register.description: Performs stage 1 and 2 address translations as defined for PL0 and the Non-secure state, with permissions as if writing to the given virtual address.

register.name: ATS1CPR
register.gui_name: Address Translate Stage 1 Current state PL1 Read
register.description: Performs stage 1 address translation as defined for PL1 and the current Security state, with permissions as if reading from the given virtual address.

register.name: ATS1CPW
register.gui_name: Address Translate Stage 1 Current state PL1 Write
register.description: Performs stage 1 address translation as defined for PL1 and the current Security state, with permissions as if writing to the given virtual address.

register.name: ATS1CUR
register.gui_name: Address Translate Stage 1 Current state Unprivileged Read
register.description: Performs stage 1 address translation as defined for PL0 and the current Security state, with permissions as if reading from the given virtual address.

register.name: ATS1CUW
register.gui_name: Address Translate Stage 1 Current state Unprivileged Write
register.description: Performs stage 1 address translation as defined for PL0 and the current Security state, with permissions as if writing to the given virtual address.

register.name: ATS1HR
register.gui_name: Address Translate Stage 1 Hyp mode Read
register.description: Performs stage 1 address translation as defined for PL2 and the Non-secure state, with permissions as if reading from the given virtual address.

register.name: ATS1HW
register.gui_name: Address Translate Stage 1 Hyp mode Write
register.description: Performs stage 1 address translation as defined for PL2 and the Non-secure state, with permissions as if writing to the given virtual address.

register.name: PAR
register.description: Returns the output address (OA) from an Address translation instruction that executed successfully, or fault information if the instruction did not execute successfully.

bitField.name: LPAE
bitField.description: When updating the PAR with the result of the translation operation, this bit is set as follows:

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: Indicates whether the instruction performed a successful address translation.

register.name: PAR_64
register.description: Returns the output address (OA) from an Address translation instruction that executed successfully, or fault information if the instruction did not execute successfully.

bitField.name: LPAE
bitField.description: When updating the PAR with the result of the translation operation, this bit is set as follows:

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: Indicates whether the instruction performed a successful address translation.

bitField.description: When updating the PAR with the result of the translation operation, this bit is set as follows:

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: Indicates whether the instruction performed a successful address translation.

register.description: Returns the output address (OA) from an Address translation instruction that executed successfully, or fault information if the instruction did not execute successfully.

bitField.name: LPAE
bitField.description: When updating the PAR with the result of the translation operation, this bit is set as follows:

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: Indicates whether the instruction performed a successful address translation.

register.name: N_PAR
register.description: Returns the output address (OA) from an Address translation instruction that executed successfully, or fault information if the instruction did not execute successfully.

bitField.description: When updating the PAR with the result of the translation operation, this bit is set as follows:

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: Indicates whether the instruction performed a successful address translation.

register.name: N_PAR_64
register.description: Returns the output address (OA) from an Address translation instruction that executed successfully, or fault information if the instruction did not execute successfully.

bitField.name: LPAE
bitField.description: When updating the PAR with the result of the translation operation, this bit is set as follows:

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: Indicates whether the instruction performed a successful address translation.

tcf:enumItem.description: Short-descriptor translation table format used. This means the PAR returned a 32-bit value.
tcf:enumItem.name: Short_descriptor_translation_table_format_used
